179312.name: 16.1.2 - Number of conflict-related deaths (civilians), by sex, age and cause of death (Number) - VC_DTH_TOCVN - All age ranges or no breaks by age - Both sexes - Incendiary; Chemical, biological, radiological, nuclear (CBRN); Electromagnetic weapons; Less lethal weapons; Denial of access to/ destruction of objects indispensable to survival; Accidents related to conflict; Use of objects and other means; Multiple Weapons Used.
179312.datasetName: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals - United Nations (2021-10)

source.name: Office of the High Commissioner for Human Rights
source.dataPublisherSource: Office of the High Commissioner for Human Rights
source.additionalInfo:
Variable description: Number of conflict-related deaths (civilians), by sex, age and cause of death (Number) 
 
 Variable code: VC_DTH_TOCVN 
 
 Metadata available at: https://unstats.un.org/sdgs/metadata/files/Metadata-16-01-02.pdf 
 
 Detailed sources: The figures include only direct conflict-related deaths of civilians recorded by the United Nations.  Office of the High Commissioner for Human Rights (OHCHR)
